Description: Book of the Dead; frame 1 (twelve fragments); red and yellow borders; remains of coloured vignettes.
Curator's comments: See B. Luescher, Totenbuch-papyrus Neuchatel Eg. 429 und Princeton Pharaonic Roll 2 (BAA 1, Basel 2007).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57499) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57499)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, stained, frayed Black ink Red ink Pigment Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather (deteriorated) Binding: scotch magic tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
